column3: When you reach level 6, devour all your characters. Then fill your board with random level 6 characters.
All your characters are Good. Your abilities that affect Evil characters affect Good characters.
Your characters have +5/+5.
Double the abilities of your level 2 and 3 treasures.
Give your first character that dies each brawl +2/+1 permanently.
Your Evil characters have +1 Attack. They have an additional +1 Attack for each of your Animals that died this brawl.
Your characters have +2 Attack if you have three Evil characters, and +2 Health of you have three Good characters.
When you summon a character during a brawl, give it Attack and Health equal to your level.
When you reach level 6, become the Big Bad Wolf. (Your characters have +5/+5.)
You start with Knighthood. (Permanently Upgrade a character.)
When you pick a treasure, your choices are all 1 level higher.
Characters in your front row have +2 Health.
You need just two copies to Upgrade a character, but they don't give you a treasure.
Your Evil characters have +1/+1.
Cast a random spell each round. (Instead of being able to buy spells)
When you roll, give a random character in the shop Attack and Health equal to your level.
When you reach level 3, get two spells that let you pick a new hero.
When you cast a spell, give a random character +1/+1 permanently.
Your Royals have +1/+2 for each Royal you've Upgraded.
The first time one of your characters dies each brawl, summon the highest Attack character from your hand.
When your health drops to 20 or less, pick a treasure of your level.

column1: Pick again when you drop to 5 or less.

column3: Your Good characters have +1/+1.
Your first Last Breath ability each brawl triggers twice.
When you reach level 4, level 2 and 3 characters no longer appear in your shop.
You start at level 3 and never grow up! Characters in your shop have +1/+1 for each time you would have leveled.
Your shop sells an extra Animal with +1/+1.
Your shop sells an extra spell.

column1: When you cast a spell directly on a character, give it +1/+1 permanently.

column3: Your characters with Support give an additional +2/+1.
You get the first attack each brawl.Your first character has "Slay: +2 Attack permanently."
After each brawl, you and your opponent each gain +1 Gold.
When you find a treasure, give your characters +1/+1 permanently.
You start with +2 XP and skip your first round.
Buy 2 Good characters to get a level 2 Good character, then increase this ability by one.
+1 Gold each round, but take 3 damage if you don't buy a spell.
Your Upgraded characters have +3/+3. The first character you buy is destined to Upgrade.
You start with 3 Kidnaps. (Get an exact copy of the first enemy character that dies this brawl.)
When you cast a spell, it's free for the rest of the game.
Your Last Breath abilities are also Slay abilities. Your last Breath characters have +2 Attack.
You need just two copies to Upgrade level 2 and 3 Animals.
